title: 72/127. Observer status for the Eurasian Group on Combating Money Laundering and Financing of Terrorism in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/72/127
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
18 December 2017 
 
17-22172 (E)    201217     
*1722172* 
 
 
Seventy-second session 
Agenda item 172 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 7 December 2017 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/72/475)] 
 
 
 72/127. Observer status for the Eurasian Group on Combating Money 
Laundering and Financing of Terrorism in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Eurasian 
Group on Combating Money Laundering and Financing of Terrorism, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Eurasian Group on Combating Money Laundering 
and Financing of Terrorism to participate in the sessions and the work of the General 
Assembly in the capacity of observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
67th plenary meeting  
7 December 2017

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Eurasian Group on Combating Money Laundering and Financing of Terrorism to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution. 67th plenary meeting 7 December 2017
